import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { PythonApisService } from '../python-apis.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { loginUserResp:any; saveUserResp:any; constructor(public apiService:PythonApisService){} loginUser(username:any,password:any) { this.loginUserResp=this.apiService.userLogin(username,password); } saveUser(username:any,email:any,pass:any,cpass:any) { this.apiService.sendMail(email,'Invitation user','This is test body'); this.saveUserResp=this.apiService.saveUser(email,username,pass,cpass); } } Account Info

Adilab System is one of the IT service providers having presence all over the globe. The company deals in the development and support of web, mobile, desktop, backend and server related solutions. The company has proven record of successful project implementation from scratch till deployment and after go live 24/7 support having team at client site and remote. We have prestigious customer around the globe such as fortune companies, and big multinational from every sector having strong relationship and bonding to us as they enjoy our service. These customers are from decade that we build their trust on us and this legacy will continue to goes on.
